Name: Peter
Dialogue: Beatrice you're a girl what do I do with this girl tonight

Name: Peter
Dialogue: Not much, excited to see the new movie tonight

Name: Bea
Dialogue: Yes. I'm a girl. Does that mean I want to help you with your girl problems? No.

Name: Peter
Dialogue: Hey, I didnt assume your girlness would help with my girl issues. I just hoped a girl would help with girl things

Name: Bea
Dialogue: Tooooooooooooo bad. You're smart, i'm sure youll figure it out

Name: Bea
Dialogue: Oh yeah? I saw it last night at the prescreening. It was really good!

Name: Peter
Dialogue: Spoilers! Fuck that noise, ill see you later.

Name: Peter
Dialogue: Dope! I cant wait to see it, we can talk about it tomorrow
